title: Letterpress
content:
Hi everybody,

I'm looking to buy a table top letterpress, either a proof press or an Adana, preferably an 8x5.

Does anybody know where I can purchase one from other than ebay?

I'm based in the UK and it's so frustrating as there seem to be plenty of dealers over in America but none over here!

Thanks, Sam
author: moonblob

comments.content: Hi there. Try the briarpress. I know there are lots of brits over there who can help. Cheers.
Yep, I was gonna recommend Briar Press as well.

You can also join LETPRESS mailing list and ask there.  
URL: [https://listserv.unb.ca/archives/letpress.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134746/https:/listserv.unb.ca/archives/letpress.html "https://listserv.unb.ca/archives/letpress.html")
